程序包的使用
com.view.XListView

  • 使用com.view.XListView的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.view.XListView  
    com.view.XListView.internal  
  • com.view.XListView使用的com.view.XListView中的类 
    类和说明
    ILoadingLayout 
    IPullToRefresh 
    PullToRefreshAdapterViewBase 
    PullToRefreshBase 
    PullToRefreshBase.AnimationStyle 
    PullToRefreshBase.Mode 
    PullToRefreshBase.OnLastItemVisibleListener
    Simple Listener that allows you to be notified when the user has scrolled to the end of the AdapterView.
    PullToRefreshBase.OnPullEventListener
    Listener that allows you to be notified when the user has started or finished a touch event.
    PullToRefreshBase.OnRefreshListener
    Simple Listener to listen for any callbacks to Refresh.
    PullToRefreshBase.OnRefreshListener2
    An advanced version of the Listener to listen for callbacks to Refresh.
    PullToRefreshBase.Orientation 
    PullToRefreshBase.State 
    PullToRefreshScrollView 
    PullToRefreshScrollView.ScrollViewListener 
    XListView.IXListViewListener
    implements this interface to get refresh/load more event.
  • com.view.XListView.internal使用的com.view.XListView中的类 
    类和说明
    ILoadingLayout 
    PullToRefreshBase.Mode 
    PullToRefreshBase.Orientation
